snippet: Marian Gaborik scored the winning goal in the third overtime as the Rangers took a two-games-to-one lead in the Eastern Conference semifinal series against the Capitals.
abstract: New York Rangers defeat Washington Capitals, 2-1, in three overtimes to take 2-1 lead their second-round NHL playoff series. Photos (M)
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON -- Marian Gaborik stood outside the Rangers' dressing room, exhausted but happy and, most of all, redeemed. ''It was about will,'' he said. ''We wanted to win this game.''

headline.main: Midnight Lightning Strikes for Gaborik and the Rangers
